description:
Fufu Tools is a toolbox with a collection of gadgets.


> With several starts(Branches), but just one end(Release)~

> [!TIP]
> 独立开发工具包仓库 → [DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools)
> 这是芙芙工具箱的最后一个版本，在这个版本之后仅继续维护开发工具包。

## 修改
(这里相对的是上一个正式版 1.4.2)

### 修复
- fix: 修复使用相对路径运行时配置文件路径错误的问题 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/256

### 杂项
- chore(move): 重命名工具 文件对比清理 至 素材清理 by @DuckDuckStudio

### 依赖更新
- build(deps): bump pyside6 from 6.10.0 to 6.10.1 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/263
#### CI/CD
- build(deps): bump softprops/action-gh-release from 2.4.0 to 2.4.2 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/253 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/259
- build(deps): bump nuitka from 2.7.16 to 2.8.6 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/254 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/256 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/260
- build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4 to 5 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/258
- build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/261 & https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/262
- ci(build): 锁定 Python 3.13.x 来防止 pygame 安装错误 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/264

-> Code by 鸭鸭「カモ」 / DuckStudio
完整提交记录: https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0
